definition: to emit/to give off/to send out (or up, forth)/to brave/to face/reckless/to falsely adopt (sb's identity etc)/to feign/(literary) to cover

(after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: The site pegged me as a centric venturer.
sentences.chinese: 網站把我定爲“輕度冒險者”。

sentences.english: Now it's a magnet for thrill-seekers the world over.
sentences.chinese: 如今它就像磁鐵一般吸引着世界各地的冒險者。

sentences.english: It is suggested that insurance payments be rated up for the adventurists.
sentences.chinese: 有人建議向冒險者收更高的保險稅。

sentences.english: The adventurer recked little of the danger and hardships.
sentences.chinese: 冒險者對危險和困苦毫不在意。

sentences.english: Of all the elementals, adventurers are most likely to succeed in diplomatic overtures with water elementals.
sentences.chinese: 在所有元素中，冒險者最樂意和水元素交換建議。

sentences.english: Adventurers typically take turns keeping watch while their companions sleep.
sentences.chinese: 冒險者通常會在他們團隊進行睡眠時派人戒備。

sentences.english: Fourth, ordinary people can accept that risk takers receive huge rewards.
sentences.chinese: 第四，普通人可以接受讓冒險者獲得豐厚獎勵。

sentences.english: A risk-taker should be very brave.
Shojo: When I learned about your party of adventurers, I saw an opportunity.
sentences.chinese: 當我聽說你們這一隊冒險者的時候，我看到了機會。

sentences.english: The Raven Queen provides a method for the adventurers to travel into Death's Reach.
sentences.chinese: 鴉後保留著某個能夠讓冒險者們潛進死亡岬的方法。

sentences.english: Would you be telling me to go to daredevils anonymous?
sentences.chinese: 你能告訴我哪有冒險者組織嗎？
只要嚴肅認真的冒險者。

definition: to murder without blinking an eye (idiom)/ruthless/cold-blooded
"The Ugly Duckling" by Hans Christian Andersen 安徒生[An1 tu2 sheng1]
on call/always available/ready at all times
amphibious/dual-talented/able to work in two different lines
